title: Add jail.nix support to devenv plugin
description: Add support for jail.nix (https://git.sr.ht/~alexdavid/jail.nix) to the /devenv plugin for sandboxed development environments

title: Add sketch summarization option to jot plugin
description: Update /jot plugin to include sketch as an option to visually summarize articles, YouTube videos, and other captured content

title: Add PNG export option to sketch plugin
description: Add an option to /sketch plugin to generate a PNG image instead of/in addition to Excalidraw format
